mapper.select: select * from (select * from USER_MEMBER where id=#{id}) m left join USER_RECORD r on m.id=r.id
select * from (select g.*, ROWNUM rnum from (select * from user_grade where #{BUY_TOTAL} >= standard order by standard desc) g) where rnum = 1

select * from (select bsc.*, rownum rnum from (select * from (select b.*, s.state st from (select * from ORDERTBL where user_id = #{id}) b left join STATE s on b.state = s.STATE_NUM) bs left join CUPON_TYPE t on bs.cupon_type = t.CUPON_NUM order by bs.order_date desc)bsc) rst where rnum < 10
select num, title, reply from (select c.*, rownum rnum from (select * from counsel where user_id=#{id} order by counsel_date desc) c)rst where rnum < 10
select * from USER_LOGIN_LOG where id={id} where rownum < 10 order by CHECKIN_DATE desc
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_MEMBER set memo=#{memo} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) count from ordertbl where user_id = #{id} and state = 5
select m.id, m.name, m.phone, m.brand, m.joindate, m.account, m.bank, m.memo, r.PRICE_TOTAL from (select * from SELLER_MEMBER where id=#{id}) m left join SELLER_RECORD r on m.id=r.id

select nvl(sum(price), 0) price, nvl(sum(dhl), 0) charge from (select rs.* from (select p.seller_id, o.price, o.dhl from (select * from ORDERTBL where state = 5) o left join PRODUCTTBL p on o.pro_num = p.pro_num) rs where seller_id = #{id}) rst group by seller_id
select * from (select g.*, ROWNUM rnum from (select * from seller_grade where #{BUY_TOTAL} >= standard order by standard desc) g) where rnum = 1
select rst.* from (select b.*, rownum rnum from (select pro_num, pro_name, pro_date, sell_on, pro_qty from PRODUCTTBL where SELLER_ID = #{id} order by pro_date desc) b) rst where rnum < 10
select num, title, reply from (select c.*, rownum rnum from (select * from counsel_seller where user_id=#{id} order by counsel_date desc) c)rst where rnum < 10
mapper.update: UPDATE SELLER_MEMBER set memo=#{memo} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select avg(star) star, count(*) cnt from (select rs.* from (select rv.pro_num, rv.star, pd.seller_id from REVIEW rv left join PRODUCTTBL pd on rv.PRO_NUM = pd.PRO_NUM) rs where seller_id = #{id})
select * from USER_LEAVE_CATEGORY order by NUM asc
select * from USER_LEAVE where num = #{num}
